title: This adorable robot needs you more than you need it
description: The Groove X Lovot companion robot isnt useful  itll actually get in your way. Most robots promise to make your life easier, but Lovot is the opposite. The fuzzy little robot scoots around, following its owner through advanced AI capabilities and sensors. It can recognize up to 1,000 people, and when it spots someone it likes, it flaps its arms up, begging to be hugged. Its specifically built to form emotional attachments, its only purpose to be loved.
